amendment.description: Amendment sought to delete section 212 dealing with recording artists and recording companies.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 9 as printed in House Report 105-573 to strike provisions of the bill relating to a recording artist's obligation to fulfill a performing contract after filing for bankruptcy protection.

action.text: On agreeing to the Scott amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 111 - 316 (Roll No. 222).
